subtitle1: Select options that best fits you
subtitile2: Provide some details about your body and activity
formAgeFieldInvalidError: Age must be a valid number
formHeightFieldInvalidError: Height must be a valid number
formHeightFieldMinError: Height must be at least 120 cm
formHeightFieldMaxError: Height must be at most 250 cm
formWeightFieldInvalidError: Weight must be a valid number
formWeightFieldMinError: Weight must be at least 40 kg
formWeightFieldMaxError: Weight must be at most 120 kg
formActivityLevelField: What Is Your Physical Activity Level?
formActivityLevelFieldInvalidError: Activity level must be a valid number
